mapper.select: SELECT t.name, if(p.position = '1루수', p.name, NULL) '1루수', if(p.position = '외야수', p.name, NULL) '외야수', if(p.position = '투수', p.name, NULL) '투수' FROM player p INNER JOIN team t ON p.team_id = t.id
SELECT p.id, row_number() over(order BY p.id asc) as NO, t.name teamName, p.position, p.NAME, p.created_at from player p INNER JOIN team t ON p.team_id = t.id
